featured.text: Cartier-Bresson’s family was wealthy—his father made a fortune as a textile manufacturer—but Cartier-Bresson later joked that due to his parents’ frugal ways, it often seemed as though his family was poor.
“I was a clothes addict,” he jokes.

“I’m 15 minutes older than him, but now I’m younger because of my heart and I’m not going to respect him,” Alfred said with a grin, pointing to his brother while talking to a roomful of reporters, who laughed frequently at their jokes.
He likes to _____ and play jokes on his younger sister when their parents are not around.

definition.zh_def: 一種幽默的話語或行為，旨在引起笑聲或娛樂。
definition.en_def: A humorous statement or action intended to provoke laughter or amusement.
definition.example: He told a funny joke that made everyone laugh.
